(Alrighty then, if nobody wants to reply)

Clash and Atma stare each other =
down, until Atma takes a swing at Clash. Clash flips over Atma and fills hi=
s back with lead, all coming from one finger that can convert into a mini m=
achine gun. Atma turns around and fires into Clash. It does minimal damage.=


Clash: Can't you do better than that?

Clash's tentacles he got from Plin=
tissa wrap around Atma and restrict his arms. Clash punches away at Atma an=
d then throws him down. He turns one finger into a flamethrower and burns A=
tma with a fireball. Atma crawls to a rock and picks himself up. Clash smil=
es at the resilience of Atma. Clash lunges and spikes pop from his wrists, =
Atma ducks and flips Clash over with a Firemna's Carry, dropping him and sl=
ashing him a deep wound across his chest. Atma cartwheels and avoids a thro=
w of a boomerang, Plintissa's boomerang. Atma poses and watches Clash caref=
ully. Clash is shocked by this bot, but he himself must not have been as po=
werful as he had thought. His new tentacles all point towards Atma, Clash r=
aisea a hnad and points at Atma.

Clash: You think you are winning, now, bu=
t just wait, you will make a mistake and I will get you.

Atma snickers at =
Clash's words and gets ready to battle Clash again...
